title: Is This Neglected Cemetery Haunted?
description:
Today on a truly unique episode of real ghost stories online. 

When a young woman begins having paranormal experiences in and around her home, she begins searching for answers. 

Eventually, she discovers that her property and much of the neighborhood were built on top of a neglected cemetery.

When she approaches a friend at a neighborhood barbeque to discuss, she is interrupted by everyone’s amazement at just how well the vegetable gardens are grown on their block. 

Only she knew the true reason why the soil was so fertile.  

Fertile with the remains of human bodies.       

That story and more, today on Real Ghost Stories Online.

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!
If you like the show, please help keep us on the air and support the show by becoming an EPP (Extra Podcast Person). We'll give you a BONUS episode every week as a "Thank You" for your support.
